category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ASYNC_subscribe_to_background_tasks
preference.preference_description: Deprecated. Defines for background mode if the user will be notified upon completion of the user's background tasks. This functionality is deprecated. Background tasks should provide their own application-specific notification. The valid values for this user preference are: NONE: The user will not be notified. SUCCEED: The user will be notified when a background operation succeeds. FAIL: The user will be notified when a background operation fails. BOTH: The user will be notified when a background operation completes with either success or failure. This is the default value.
